summary: This is an email from an unknown sender to Allison Stoddart at WilmerHale regarding the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (MN). The email includes an attachment and appears to be legal correspondence related to the ongoing prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 20, 2021, concerning the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (docket 20 Cr. 330 (MN)).
The email is sent to Allison Stoddart, whose email domain is associated with the law firm WilmerHale.
The email includes an attachment, though its contents are not described in the provided text.
